section.name: Upgrading
section.p: If you followed the standard procedure for installing the community, and used the standard directory layout then you have community software in inside Tomcat and community configuration under /astrogrid/community. To upgrade the software, first undeploy the web application using Tomcat's manager page, then reinstall the web-application using the old, saved context-file. The new software will then use the old configuration, database and user-credentials.
Before upgrading, please read the release notes to see if you need to change anything in your configuration.
